page.title: 18Bus services in Caversham
page.content: There are two bus companies in Reading, Alder Valley and Reading Transport. These buses are very distinctive because the Alder Valley ones are completely red or red and white. Reading Transport on the other hand have maroon and white so you can never get them muddled up. The Alder Valley type are normally single decker but they have some double decker buses. Reading Transport are always double deckered. Both of them are driver operated. Reading Transport provides buses in the borough .There are a few buses that go to the Caversham Park area, 51, 52 and 53. The 24 goes to Emmer Green. The fares from Caversham Park to the centre of Reading are 14p for children and 30p for adults. The buses run about every 15 minutes. Alder Valley provides country buses to Sonning and Henley.
